title: How TO - Change a Class

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Change a Class with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to change the class name of an element with JavaScript. Change Class This is a DIV. Change Class Change the class of a
element from "mystyle" to "newone": Example
This is a DIV element.
Tip: Also see How To Toggle A Class . Tip: Learn more about the classList property in our JavaScript Reference. ★ +1
